author: Staff Reporter
text: The Central Crime Branch on Saturday registered a case against a woman and her parents on the charge of cheating youngsters. P. Shruti is registered in matrimonial websites and get in touch with prospective grooms. Later, her parents Prasanna Venkatesan and Chitra would tell them that Shruti has been diagnosed with brain tumor and needed financial help. Santhosh Kumar of Erode met them at R.S. Puram about a year ago. He told the police that they took away more than Rs. 43 lakh from him.
title: Marriage scam: case against three
